intro: Capurodendron apollonioides, commonly known as the Apollonian tree, is a flowering plant native to Madagascar. It belongs to the family Anacardiaceae, which includes cashew and mango trees. Due to its limited distribution and unique morphology, it is of interest to botanists and conservationists.
